Sun, 22 Oct 2023 17:22:17 +0000 England's Tom Curry (right) and South Africa's Bongi Mbonambi (left) during the Rugby World Cup, semi final match at the Stade de France, Saint-Denis. England have until Monday morning to lodge a complaint after Tom Curry alleged he was the victim of a racist slur in Saturday's 16-15 World Cup semi-final defeat by South Africa. Picture date: Friday October 21, 2023. (Photo by Mike Egerton/PA Images via Getty Images)
